entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then clearing. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
